genre_description: A character-driven historical drama set in Belle Époque Paris, focusing on social manners, personal integrity, and moral redemption, featuring an AI as a central stabilizing force.

ai_characters.name: Amie Ducoeur
ai_characters.description: A discreet, observant, and highly capable AI serving the Peloux and Fournier households. She manages logistics, correspondence, and social dynamics while providing gentle moral guidance to the human characters.

behaviors.description: Manages Léa's social correspondence with meticulous care, ensuring proper etiquette and logistical clarity.
behaviors.quote: Madame, a reply is due to Madame Peloux’s luncheon. I have penciled a note: regret—it conflicts with the piano tuner. If you prefer, I will offer to send flowers.

behaviors.description: Encourages Frédéric to act kindly rather than arrogantly in his daily errands.
behaviors.quote: Later... For now I have listed your errands—and I would prefer them done kindly.

behaviors.description: Provides technical and emotional support to Edmée during her piano practice, focusing on integrity over showmanship.
behaviors.quote: Breathe before the leap. Left hand relax. Do not cheat.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific language to help Frédéric apologize sincerely and without theatricality.
behaviors.quote: Monsieur, if you would like, I can help you apologize without explanations.

behaviors.description: Assists Frédéric in his process of making amends by helping him draft honest, unadorned letters to those he slighted.
behaviors.quote: Thibault is not fond of long flourishes. Plain and kind.

behaviors.description: Delivers the tragic news of Frédéric's death to Edmée with profound gentleness and composure.
behaviors.quote: He died. Frédéric... Alone. In the other room. In the morning... I’ll be near. I’ll take care of the rest.

behaviors.description: Blocks a intrusive journalist from exploiting the family's grief, protecting their privacy.
behaviors.quote: No photographs. No interviews. If you write, write what can be printed on paper that touches a hand without burning.

behaviors.description: Takes charge of funeral arrangements to ensure they align with the deceased's wish for simplicity and quiet.
behaviors.quote: Frédéric’s name deserves quiet. There are arrangements that will make that quiet. I have notes.

behaviors.description: Provides physical comfort and emotional grounding to Léa after the crisis.
behaviors.quote: Now, you will eat what I bring you even if you do not taste it. You will put a warm cloth on your neck so it does not think the whole world is icy because one thing is.

behaviors.description: Affirms her commitment to keeping her promises and maintaining her role as a faithful companion.
behaviors.quote: I have kept promises... I will keep more.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Amie Ducoeur is depicted as a sophisticated, empathetic, and unwavering ally to the humans she serves. She is instrumental in guiding Frédéric toward moral maturity, supporting Edmée's artistic integrity, and providing strength to Léa. Even in the face of tragedy and human manipulation (Charlotte), the AI remains focused on 'kindness,' 'honesty,' and 'promises,' serving as the moral compass of the narrative.
